statements: SELECT * FROM viewer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT engagement_score, viewer_id, video_id FROM viewer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, engagement_score FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS avg_score FROM viewer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, engagement_score FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT viewer_id, MAX(engagement_score) AS max_score FROM viewer_engagement_metrics GROUP BY viewer_id;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM viewer_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 0 ORDER BY engagement_score DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, engagement_score FROM viewer_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8;
SELECT * FROM EngagementMetrics;
SELECT viewer_id, time_spent_minutes, interactions FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM ViewerDetails WHERE viewer_id = 2;
SELECT viewer_id, time_spent_minutes FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE time_spent_minutes > 10;
SELECT * FROM ViewerDetails ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM EngagementMetrics WHERE interactions > 10 AND time_spent_minutes > 30
SELECT viewer_id, time_spent_minutes FROM EngagementMetrics ORDER BY time_spent_minutes DESC
SELECT AVG(time_spent_minutes) AS average_time_spent FROM EngagementMetrics
SELECT full_name, email FROM ViewerDetails WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT viewer_id, SUM(interactions) AS total_interactions FROM EngagementMetrics GROUP BY viewer_id HAVING total_interactions > 50
SELECT viewer_name, viewer_email FROM viewers;
SELECT video_title, video_length FROM videos ORDER BY video_length DESC;

SELECT viewer_name, video_title, engagement_level FROM viewers JOIN engagement_metrics ON viewers.viewer_id = engagement_metrics.viewer_id JOIN videos ON engagement_metrics.video_id = videos.video_id;

SELECT viewer_name, video_title, engagement_level FROM viewers JOIN engagement_metrics ON viewers.viewer_id = engagement_metrics.viewer_id JOIN videos ON engagement_metrics.video_id = videos.video_id WHERE engagement_level > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT viewer_name, viewer_email FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, viewer_email FROM viewers WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT video_id, video_title, video_length FROM videos ORDER BY video_length DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, video_title, engagement_level FROM viewers v JOIN engagement_metrics em ON v.viewer_id = em.viewer_id JOIN videos vid ON em.video_id = vid.video_id WHERE engagement_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM engagement_metrics WHERE viewer_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;

SELECT viewer_name, video_title, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, timestamp, NOW()) AS minutes_since_engagement FROM viewers v JOIN engagement_metrics em ON v.viewer_id = em.viewer_id JOIN videos vid ON em.video_id = vid.video_id WHERE engagement_level > 70 ORDER BY minutes_since_engagement DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_name, email FROM viewers ORDER BY viewer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_length > 10;
SELECT viewer_name, video_title FROM viewers JOIN views ON viewers.viewer_id = views.viewer_id JOIN videos ON views.video_id = videos.video_id;
SELECT viewer_name, COUNT(view_id) AS view_count FROM viewers JOIN views ON viewers.viewer_id = views.viewer_id GROUP BY viewer_name;
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_name, email FROM viewers WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT video_title, video_length FROM videos ORDER BY video_length DESC;

SELECT v.viewer_name, vi.video_title, e.engagement_type FROM viewers v JOIN views vw ON v.viewer_id = vw.viewer_id JOIN videos vi ON vw.video_id = vi.video_id JOIN engagements e ON vw.view_id = e.view_id;
SELECT viewer_name, COUNT(video_title) AS total_views FROM viewers v JOIN views vw ON v.viewer_id = vw.viewer_id JOIN videos vi ON vw.video_id = vi.video_id GROUP BY viewer_name;
SELECT * FROM ViewerEngagementMetrics;
SELECT viewer_id, engagement_type, timestamp FROM ViewerEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT viewer_id, video_id, engagement_type FROM ViewerEngagementMetrics ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT video_title, category FROM Videos WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT viewer_id, viewer_name, email, country FROM ViewerProfiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM ViewerEngagementMetrics WHERE engagement_type = 'like';
SELECT viewer_name, email, country FROM ViewerProfiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT video_title, category, upload_date FROM Videos WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT comment_text, timestamp FROM Comments WHERE video_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT viewer_name, rating FROM ViewerProfiles JOIN Ratings ON ViewerProfiles.viewer_id = Ratings.viewer_id WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY viewer_name ASC;
